item.title: NexClipper Exhibited at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2019 - San Diego
item.guid: NexClipper Exhibited at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2019 - San Diego
item.description: Now back to Seoul, Korea, we would like to wrap up and share what we gained out of exhibition at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America 2019 - San Diego (Nov. 18-21, 2019).

item.title: Come Meet Us at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America - 2019, San Diego!
item.guid: Come Meet Us at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America - 2019, San Diego!
item.description: NexClipper is exhibiting at KubeCon + CloudNativeCon North America - 2019 taking place at San Diego Convention Center throughout November 18 to 21, 2019 (we're only 3 nights away).

item.title: Report: NexClipper at PromCon EU 2019, Munich (Nov. 07-08, 2019)
item.guid: Report: NexClipper at PromCon EU 2019, Munich (Nov. 07-08, 2019)
item.description: We are now back to Seoul writing a brief post-event report on our attendance to PromCon EU 2019 held in Munich, on Nov. 07 & 08, 2019.

item.title: Meet NexClipper at PromCon EU 2019, Munich!
item.guid: Meet NexClipper at PromCon EU 2019, Munich!
item.description: We’re excited about this opportunity to present our NexClipper project we’re in progress in link with Prometheus and OpenMetrics to the community and to network with the professionals working around Prometheus whilst having access to the latest issues and trends at PromCon EU 2019.

item.title: NexClipper Joined the Open Invention Network
item.guid: NexClipper Joined the Open Invention Network
item.description: We are proudly announcing that NexClipper (as of October 29, 2019) is now a member project of the Open Invention Network (OIN, hereon), the world-largest community committed to protecting Linux/OSS-based programs from patent risks.

item.title: How Useful is AIOps?
item.guid: How Useful is AIOps?
item.description: As IT operations have rapidly evolved for the decades, the gigantic amount of data involved with your application infrastructure is almost incomprehensive. In order for organizations to deal with this, they started to keep an eye on AIOps(Artificial Intelligence for IT Operations) which leverages AI to IT Operations.

item.description: NexCloud, providing NexClipper which is the container monitoring and intelligence operation supporting solution, has joined the Cloud Native Computing Foundation (CNCF) as a silver membership.
